sections.title: Overview
sections.content: The Character class represents a player character in the game, encompassing various attributes that define the character's identity, status, class, race, and more. Each attribute is explained in detail below.

sections.title: name
sections.content: A string representing the character's name as chosen by the player.

sections.title: gender
sections.content: A string representing the character's gender, such as 'Male' or 'Female'.

sections.title: elements
sections.content: A list of strings representing the character's elements or elemental affinities, such as ['Fire', 'Water'].

sections.title: base_class
sections.content: A string representing the character's basic class, such as 'Warrior' or 'Mage'.

sections.title: advanced_class
sections.content: A string representing the character's advanced or specialized class, if applicable.

sections.title: race
sections.content: A string representing the character's race, such as 'Human', 'Elf', or 'Dwarf'.

sections.title: alignment
sections.content: A string representing the character's alignment, such as 'Good', 'Neutral', or 'Evil'.

sections.title: nobility_rank
sections.content: A string representing the character's nobility rank, if applicable, such as 'Duke' or 'Baroness'.

sections.title: title
sections.content: A string representing any special title the character may have earned or been bestowed with.

sections.title: achievements
sections.content: A list of strings representing the character's achievements within the game.

sections.title: racial_ability
sections.content: A string representing a special ability or trait that is unique to the character's race.
